com.soa.console.activity.render

Class AbstractActivityRenderer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.soa.console.activity.render.AbstractActivityRenderer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ActivityRenderer

    public abstract class AbstractActivityRenderer
extends java.lang.Object
implements ActivityRenderer
    Abstract implementation of the ActivityRenderer interface. Provides some of the more common yet simple operations required of an ActivityRenderer implementation.

      • getActivityType

        public java.lang.String getActivityType()
        Description copied from interface: ActivityRenderer
        Gets the activity type. This type is used as a key by the framework when looking for a renderer for an activity.

        Returns:
        the activity type

      • setActivityType

        public void setActivityType(java.lang.String activityType)
        Specifies the type of activity. Should be a unique string. The framework will use the activityType as a key when finding the right renderer for an activity in a process.
        Parameters:
        activityType -

      • getIcon

        public java.lang.String getIcon(java.util.Locale locale)
        Description copied from interface: ActivityRenderer
        Gets the icon for the activity. The icon may be locale specific so a locale is provided.
        Specified by:
        getIcon in interface ActivityRenderer
        Parameters:
        locale - the locale
        Returns:
        the icon

      • setIcon

        public void setIcon(java.lang.String icon)
        Specifies the relative path to the icon to use for the activity. The path can be specified using a locale independent key that will be looked up from the configured MessageSource for a given locale, or a hardcoded path that will be used regardless of the given locale.
        Parameters:
        icon -
